text: int maxm ( int , int ) ; int main ( ) { int n , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int max , i , j , z ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( j == 0 ) { a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; } else if ( j == i ) { a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; } else { z = maxm ( a [ i ] [ j ] , a [ i ] [ j - 1 ] ) ; a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] += z ; } } } max = a [ n - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( max < a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ) max = a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; } int maxm ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; else return b ; }
